name: Project Radar
description:
I would like to apologize to the hosts of the Make-A-Thing Jam for January 2018. I'm not a student at Brisbane, but I wanted to keep the creative juices flowing after finishing my own college's jam. I'd also like to apologize for submitting an extraordinarily bare-bones entry. I had more plans for it, but now I'll just have to settle for updates and submit what I have. Hope I wasted nobody's time.

Just click to "thwart" little "blips" on the radar, or it's game over.

UPDATED: Noticed that the game jam was still on (my mistake), so I'm adding some of the things that I think at least improve it a bit (but not by much). A title screen, stock sound effects, a reticle, and screen-shake, just to see if I could do it. Hope it's improved, and again, sorry for entering a game jam from a school I don't attend.
